tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: One of the Humblest, wise, dedicated, patient friendly doctor  I have ever come across... Fortunately we came to know while consulting for ortho.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
An excellent, and friendly doctor.  She explained all aspects of the surgery and related procedures in detail.  We consulted her in her clinic (Prime Ortho and Shoulder Clinic) and in Apollo Cradle, but for getting better OT facility, she scheduled the surgery to be conducted at Apollo Hospital, Perungudi.  She coordinated with Apollo Hospital to book the OT and other required facilities and did the surgery at Apollo Hospital.  She has been of immense support to me , all along the treatment.  She was always available for discussions and to give us all guidance.  Because of the kind of care she provided, we felt like we were dealing with a family member.

There are no words to thank the doctor, for whatever care & support, that she has been giving to me all along the treatment. I would 100% recommend Dr. Bobby M.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Bobby for my 73 year old Mom's uterus related issue. Doctor was very patient in listening (and has got very good memory!) and after evaluating in detail, suggested to go for Hysterectomy. She also coordinated with Apollo Hospital and arranged for the surgery. During the entire time in the hospital, the doctor kept track of all issues and took personal interest. My mom is recovering and in good health now. I'm very happy to recommend Dr.Bobby and would be pleased to provide any reference.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Bobby is a very friendly person and carries an amazing personality. One feels so comfortable at the very first visit itself,that you open up your problems with much ease to her. She has been of immense support to me , all along the treatment. Her empathy is commendable and the positivity she emotes, have always made me develop a positive outlook. She was always available, in times of need. I am blessed to have the treatment under her. There are no words to thank the doctor, for whatever care & support, that she has been giving to me all along the treatment. I would 100% recommend Dr. Bobby for all the gyne problems. I wish 
Dr. Bobby all success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Bobby is very friendly and makes you comfortable the very first time you meet her. She treated me for Scar Endometriosis and gave a clear picture of the further treatment and diagonasis. She really cares for you and always available through phone for any queries related to the treatment. I have never seen any doctor constantly staying in touch with the patient throughout the treatment.My surgery was planned in a short time but she organized and coordinated with the prerequisite tests, scans to be done etc. in few days and the surgery was done successfully without any chaos. I highly recommend Dr. Bobby for any Gynecological related issues as she is very much dedicated, well experienced, open for even simple questions and gives a clear picture of the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is not just a Dr but a great advisor and an amazing counsellor . I went for my irregular mensturation problem initially which not only she treated but explained me with each and every instances. She helped me loads with my planning and with all odds she advised the best one . If I say Dr that is not enough to call her , she is an amazing counsellor too which she does with her calmness and make sure the patient is more calmed and satisfied . She is available for 24*7for any patient I believe . In this pandemic as well she did her best by replying to all my questions on call . She never failed to reply me with my answers . Must recommended Dr in Chennai. I m super satisfied with my treatment and will rate her the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I can't say enough about my experience with Dr.Bobby. She takes time to explain the treatment, and genuinely cares about the health and well-being of all her patients. I had menopausal symptoms and felt fatigue, and Dr.Bobby was very patient and made sure I was feeling much better very soon. The way she explained about the whole issue and treated it, tells that she's got immense knowledge and experience. Lastly, she's tremendously sweet, which would make any patient feel comfortable in explaining their issues. I would 100% recommended Dr.Bobby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a very comfortable and pleasant experience with Dr.Bobby .. She is one of the very few doctors to clearly explain our condition and treatment options backed up by solid evidence based approach . Her empathy and concern in approaching the patients is unparalleled and all my family members were satisfied with her reassurance in answering in even the simplest of the doubts ... Her constant review through online consultations eased our worries .. would definitely recommend her to anyone seeking an informed gynaecology experience ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: As a senior citizen I never come across such a kind and most caring Doctor. She takes more care and treating as family member. Explain the problems and giving confidence for recovery. Giving 100 percent sucess. I highly recommend for those in need of searching best physician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor made me to understand  the issues what I was facing and guide me with proper solutions to solve our problems .Because of her guidance we are now blessed with baby boy.We are thankful for all her guidance throughout the pregnancy journey .I once again thank  our doctor Bobby mam for all her suggestions at critical situations. We are happy to meet such lovely  person in our pregnancy journey .Thanks from bottom of our heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ ** *** ***** The detailed explanation as well as being available for your assistance during entire pregnancy which she provided is impeccable. Thank you so much for your guidance throughout my pregnancy even though I was put up in another city.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ************ *** *** ***. She helped to know each stage of pregnancy in detail with all possible way to make it easier. I am based out in Pune. She was available for all the advice anytime consulted even at night. Thank you so much for all the help and advice. Today I am blessed with baby girl and she is one of the reason to make my pregnancy period easier as she always boosts up your confidence. Thank you doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted doctor for the heavy blood flow with severe stomach pain while menstrual period. She is so friendly and enquired me in a detailed way then  asked to do scan finally. As doctor suspected  Fibroid (5 cm ) has been  found in the scan. She clearly explained what is about fibroid and how can we treat this. The way she described about the treatment is very crisp and clear. I started the treatment and it is going fine. I am really very happy with the service . Thanks a lot mam...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Bobby is very friendly and great. I went for treatment and she made me feel confident that I can get well. Very caring and kind towards me. She is very dedicated to treat well and she also explained me diet and helped me a lot. I am very happy *** *** ** **** ************ **** **** Thank you ma'am

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: we have contacted the Doctor for pregnancy checkup. From the time we have contacted the doctor, she has taken utmost care from making us understand the procedure for the next 36 weeks. she has given us week by week schedule to follow. Doctor is extremely knowledgeable and very humble in explaining things to us. As we were finding it difficult to get the scan done due to lock down, doctor has helped us in finding the best people to get the sxan done for us. She had called them to expain the issue before we even reach them, which made us feel very relaxing once we know that doctor had already called them about our issue.  I have never seen a doctor who will go to this extent to help their patients. Doctor was always available whenever needed. Even in odd hours, she was available texting us. I would recommend this doctor to all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a sweet and nice person.started the procedure after knowing the whole history.highly recommende
